pages.text: The Auxiliary Ink Supplier allows an $(l:magic/ink)Ink$()-containing item to be connected to a machine as though it were inserted into that machine's $(l:magic/ink)Ink$() storage slot. The primary use-case for this is automatically supplying a $(l:magical_blocks/cinderhearth)Cinderhearth$() with multiple different colors of $(l:magic/ink)Ink$().

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Has a max distance of 3 blocks. Use a Binding Tool to link it to its target.
